text: Westside Connection was an American gangsta rap music group. The members were Mack 10, WC and Ice Cube. The group was formed in 1994. Their first album, Bow Down, reached #2 on the Billboard 200 chart in 1996. The group released a second rap studio album, Terrorist Threats. Category:American rap music groups Category:Musical groups established in 1994 Category:1994 establishments in the United States
title: Westside Connection
